p.d: Pierre Braunberger, Anatole Dauman, Robert Dorfmann, the Hakim brothers, Mag Bodard, Alain Poir√©, Pierre Cottrell, Albina du Boisrouvray, Jacques Perrin... Between the post-war years and the end of the 1970s, self-taught, passionate, ready to take a risk, they worked in the shadows to produce films that still mark audiences today. Directed by: Florence Strauss, Gioacchino Campanella (France, 2019)
